Best Restaurants in Park City

Your curated guide to Park City's finest dining experiences

Showing 20 restaurants

Riverhorse on Main

$$$$
New American (French/Italian influences) Main Street

Park City's most distinguished fine dining restaurant, operating as a 16-year Forbes Four Star Award winner. Located on the second floor of a historic Main Street building with a famous patio overlooking the heart of downtown. Features live music nightly at 7pm and a perpetually rotating seasonal menu.

Must Try:
  • Rainbow Trout w/ pistachio crust
  • Ahi Tuna Stack
  • Lobster Bisque
  • Wagyu Bites
  • Silver Mine Mule cocktail
Daily 5-9pm (9:30pm Fri-Sat)
435-649-3536
540 Main Street, Park City, UT 84060
Patio Live Music Historic Building Wine List Valet Nearby Reservations Required
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Apex at Montage Deer Valley

$$$$
Modern American Steakhouse Deer Valley

Montage Deer Valley's signature restaurant that transforms into 'Apex Steak' each evening. Features unique Alpenglobes for 90-minute enclosed outdoor dining experiences with panoramic Deer Valley views. Executive Chef Kevin Hee brings progressive twists to traditional American steakhouse classics.

Must Try:
  • A5 Japanese Wagyu
  • Shellfish Platter
  • Beef Tartare w/ roasted bone marrow
  • Organic Salmon
  • Filet Mignon
  • Flambéed signature desserts
Breakfast 7-10:30am, Lunch 11:30am-3pm, Dinner 5:30-9:30pm
435-604-1402
9100 Marsac Ave, Park City, UT 84060
Alpenglobes Mountain Views Ski In Ski Out Complimentary Valet Fireplace Wine List Private Dining
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Courchevel Bistro

$$-$$$$
French-European Main Street

Named after Park City's sister city in the French Alps and housed in the historic Coal & Lumber building. Executive Chef Clement Gelas, who actually grew up in Courchevel, France, brings authentic French-European cuisine. CNN Travel named it one of the 'World's Best New Restaurants for 2020.'

Must Try:
  • Duck Breast (always available)
  • Baked Brie w/ Park City Creamery cheese
  • Moules Frites
  • Tartiflette
  • Crozets de Savoie
  • Arctic Char Bouillabaisse
Tue-Sat 5-9pm (Closed Sun-Mon)
435-572-4398
201 Heber Ave, Park City, UT 84060
Historic Building French Chef Wine Spectator Award Open Kitchen Seasonal Menu Corkage Available
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

The Mariposa

$$$$
Contemporary American (Tasting Menus) Silver Lake Village

Zagat's #1 rated restaurant in Utah, located at 8,100 feet elevation in Silver Lake Lodge. Offers an intimate tasting room dining experience with 6- and 8-course menus highlighting decadent ingredients and seasonal local products. Only operates during ski season, making reservations highly coveted.

Must Try:
  • 6 & 8-Course Tasting Menus
  • Wild Mushroom Tart
  • Burrata Salad w/ heirloom tomatoes
  • Nori-Sesame Seared Ahi
  • Famous Chocolate Snowballs
  • Pan-Roasted Sea Scallops
Wed-Sun 5:30-9pm (Ski Season Only)
435-645-6632
7600 Royal Street, Silver Lake Lodge, Park City, UT 84060
Tasting Menus Mid Mountain Location Fireplaces Seasonal Operation Wine Spectator Award Private Dining Vegan Options
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

The Eating Establishment

$$
American (Breakfast All Day) Main Street

Park City's oldest full-service restaurant since 1972, serving three generations of families. Famous for 'breakfast all day' concept that kids especially love - you can order pancakes at dinner time! Features a kids menu with photos so little ones can pick what they want even if they can't read yet.

Must Try:
  • Fish Tacos (most popular)
  • Made-from-scratch Pancakes
  • Buttery Noodles (kids favorite)
  • Grilled Chicken Cobb
  • BLTA
  • Established Burger
Mon-Wed,Sun 8am-4pm, Thu-Sat 8am-10pm (seasonal)
435-649-8284
317 Main Street, Park City, UT 84060
Breakfast All Day Kids Menu With Photos Historic Building Fireplace Outdoor Patio Craft Cocktails Large Portions
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Silver Star Café

$$$
New American (Roots Cuisine) Silver Star Village

Award-winning 'Hidden Gem' featured on Food Network's Diners, Drive-ins & Dives. True mom-and-pop operation where kids grew up in restaurants and now help run it. 360-degree mountain views with safe outdoor patio where little ones can wander while waiting for food. Live acoustic music Thu-Sat evenings.

Must Try:
  • Crispy Pork Belly
  • Elk Burger
  • Vegetarian Mushroom Stroganoff
  • Pork Osso Bucco
  • Artisan Pizza (kids love)
  • Wild Mushroom Tart
Mon-Fri 11am-3pm & 5-9pm, Sat-Sun 9am-3pm & 5-9pm
435-655-3456
1825 Three Kings Drive, Park City, UT 84060
360 Degree Mountain Views Live Acoustic Music Ski In Ski Out Outdoor Patio Kids Menu Dog Friendly Patio Featured On Food Network
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Grub Steak Restaurant

$$$
Western Steakhouse Prospector Square

Park City's longest standing steakhouse since 1976. Famous for an amazing kids menu that includes salmon, steak, and baby back ribs - not just chicken fingers. The legendary 45-item salad bar is included with all dinners. Head chef Brian is the longest tenured chef in Utah, with live country music Thu-Sat.

Must Try:
  • Custom Aged Certified Angus Beef
  • Tender Pork Baby Back Ribs
  • Prime Rib (as big as the plate)
  • Rocky Mountain Lamb Chops
  • Bison Tenderloin
  • 45-Item Salad Bar (included)
Daily 5pm-9pm
435-649-8060
2093 Sidewinder Drive, Park City, UT 84060
Amazing Kids Menu 45 Item Salad Bar Live Country Music Rustic Fireplace Western Atmosphere Gluten Free Certified Accommodates Large Groups
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Hearth & Hill

$$
Contemporary American Kimball Junction

Family-owned 'gathering spot' since 2018 by father-son duo. Elevated kids menu includes kid-friendly steak and fish dishes, not just typical fare. Children under 2 get complimentary buttered noodles. Contemporary American cuisine with global flair, from Korean fried chicken to build-your-own Old Fashioned.

Must Try:
  • Truffle Mac & Cheese
  • H&H Burger with smoked cheddar
  • Korean Fried Chicken
  • Cheddar Biscuits
  • Tuna Poke Bowl
  • Build-Your-Own Old Fashioned
Mon-Fri 11am-9pm, Sat-Sun 10am-9pm (brunch)
435-200-8840
1153 Center Drive, Park City, UT 84098
Elevated Kids Menu Family Restroom Changing Table Dog Friendly Patio Free Covered Parking Extensive Gluten Free Options Weekend Brunch Global Inspired Menu
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

High West Saloon

$$$
American/Whiskey Bar Main Street

World's only ski-in distillery located at the bottom of Quittin' Time ski run. Historic 1870s saloon atmosphere with award-winning whiskeys and elevated pub fare. Walk-in only, expect waits during ski season.

Must Try:
  • Charcuterie & Cheese Board
  • Whiskey Caramelized Onion Soup
  • Burnt Ends Poutine
  • House-Made Pretzel with Whiskey Beer Cheese
  • Rendezvous Rye Whiskey
Daily 11am-10pm
435-649-8300
703 Park Avenue, Park City, UT 84060
Ski In Access Distillery Tours Walk In Only 21 Plus Only Historic Building Working Distillery
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

The Bridge Cafe & Grill

$$
Brazilian-American Fusion Main Street

Brazilian-American fusion restaurant with ski-in/ski-out access at Town Lift base. Features sunny patio with slope views and all-day breakfast. $2 sliders and hot dogs every Sunday & Thursday.

Must Try:
  • Brazilian Caipirinha
  • Bridge Mojito
  • Kibe
  • Brazuca Steak
  • Coxinhas
Daily 8am-4pm (winter extended to 9pm)
435-658-5451
825 Main Street, Suite 201 Upper Deck, Park City, UT 84060
Ski In Ski Out Sunny Patio Slope Views All Day Breakfast Live Music Summer Town Lift Access
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Umbrella Bar

$$
American Bar & Grill Canyons Village

360-degree views from glass enclosure with massive outdoor deck in center of Canyons Village. Walking distance from Red Pine Gondola in ski boots. Perfect communal après-ski atmosphere.

Must Try:
  • Burgers
  • Hot Wings
  • Chicken Tenders
  • Draft Beer Selection
  • Hot Dogs
Daily 12pm-5pm
N/A
3720 N Sundial Court, Canyons Village, Park City, UT
360 Degree Views Outdoor Deck Live Music Ski Boot Accessible 21 Plus Only Glass Enclosure
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Collie's Sports Bar & Grill

$$
American Sports Bar Main Street

Park City's only dedicated sports bar with 25+ TVs and all sports packages. Family owned & operated with dog-friendly patio. Sound dogs allow table-specific audio.

Must Try:
  • Town Lift Burger with Bleu Cheese
  • House Smoked Wings
  • Cheese Curds
  • BBQ Ribs & Brisket
  • Widow Maker Burger
Mon-Fri: 11am-1am, Sat-Sun: 10:30am-1am
435-649-0888
738 Main Street, Park City, UT 84060
25 Plus Tvs Dog Friendly Patio Sound Dogs Family Owned Across From Town Lift Sports Packages
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Après Pendry

$$$
European-American Canyons Village

Centrally located lobby lounge with European-inspired mountainside socializing atmosphere. Indoor/outdoor seating with roaring fireplace and live music events.

Must Try:
  • European-inspired shareable comfort food
  • Handcrafted cocktails
  • Artisan coffee
  • Fresh pastries
Breakfast: 7am-11am, Bar & Dining: 11am-11pm daily
N/A

RIME Oyster Bar

$$$
Seafood/Raw Bar Deer Valley

World's only slopeside raw bar located in refurbished cabin at top of Deer Valley's Jordanelle Gondola. Prime time is 2-3pm for $2.50 oyster happy hour.

Must Try:
  • Oysters on half-shell ($2.50 during happy hour)
  • Lobster rolls
  • Chowder
  • Champagne pairings
Oyster Happy Hour: 2-3pm daily
N/A
Top of Deer Valley's Jordanelle Gondola, Deer Valley Resort
Worlds Only Slopeside Raw Bar Gondola Top Location Refurbished Cabin Oyster Happy Hour Mountain Setting Limited Seating
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Five5eeds

$$
Australian Breakfast/Brunch Main Street

Australian-owned breakfast spot importing coffee from Melbourne. Famous for hotcakes with edible flowers and mascarpone. Expect long waits on weekends (1+ hours) but worth it. Waitlist system only.

Must Try:
  • Berry-topped Hotcake with Mascarpone
  • Avocado Toast with Feta & Chili Jam
  • Pulled Pork Benedict
  • Aussie-style Iced Coffee with Ice Cream
  • The Merperson Smoothie Bowl
Daily 7:30am-3pm
N/A
1600 Snow Creek Drive EF, Park City, UT 84060
Australian Owned Melbourne Coffee Import Edible Flowers Waitlist System Family Friendly Kids Menu
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Harvest

$$
Australian-style Cafe Main Street

Australian-style cafe with partnership with local Idle Hands Roasting Co. Locally-sourced ingredients with many gluten-free/vegan options. Perfect pre-ski location near Town Lift Plaza.

Must Try:
  • Soft Scrambled Eggs with Pesto
  • Buddha Bowl of Goodness
  • Vietnamese Banh Mi
  • Chicken Laksa Noodle Soup
  • Custom daily juice
Daily 8am-3pm

The Eating Establishment

$$
American Diner Main Street

Oldest full-service restaurant in Park City (since 1972) serving breakfast all day. Historic Main Street location with wood-burning fireplace. Local residents describe as 'excellent value with large portions.'

Must Try:
  • 3-Egg Omelette (choice of 3 ingredients)
  • Huevos Rancheros
  • Eggs Benedict
  • Chicken Fried Steak
  • L.E.O. (Lox, Eggs, Onions)
Daily 8am-3:59am (Closed 4-5pm daily)
435-649-8284
317 Main Street, Park City, UT 84060
Oldest Restaurant Park City All Day Breakfast Historic Building Wood Burning Fireplace Bar Area Souvenir Shop
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Silver Summit Cafe

$
American Diner/Mexican Silver Creek

Local's secret spot located in 7-Eleven gas station with surprisingly good food. Most reasonable prices in Park City. Outdoor patio overlooking golf course. Don't be put off by location.

Must Try:
  • Silver Summit Omelette (sausage, bacon, cheese)
  • Pancakes
  • Big Burrito with choice of meat
  • Mexican plates with authentic flavor
Daily breakfast and lunch (hours vary)
N/A
6065 Silver Creek Dr, Park City, UT 84098
Gas Station Location Most Reasonable Prices Outdoor Patio Golf Course Views Locals Secret Cash Tips Preferred
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Atticus Coffee & Teahouse

$
Coffee Shop/Light Breakfast Main Street

Part cafe, part bookstore with sliding library ladders and eco-conscious practices. Great terrace for watching Town Lift with funky ambiance and unique drink selections.

Must Try:
  • The Usual (bagel with cream cheese, avocado, everything seasoning)
  • Organic coffee
  • Red Velvet Mocha
  • Edgar Almond tea
Daily (hours vary)
N/A
738 Main Street, Park City, UT
Part Bookstore Sliding Library Ladders Eco Conscious Town Lift Views Terrace Seating Funky Ambiance
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

Park City Bread & Bagel

$
Bagel Shop/Breakfast Pinebrook

Hand-rolled bagels made fresh with quick service perfect for pre-ski breakfast on Wasatch side. Watch latest ski/snowboard films while eating. Mini muffins offered with sandwiches.

Must Try:
  • Hand-rolled bagels
  • Spicy Sunrise (cheddar jalapeño bagel with bacon)
  • Black Diamond with jalapeño cream cheese
  • Espresso coffee
Early morning opening for pre-ski breakfast
N/A
Located in Pinebrook, Park City, UT
Hand Rolled Bagels Quick Service Wasatch Side Location Ski Films Playing Indoor Outdoor Seating Mini Muffins
Visit Website Updated: 2025-07-05

About Our Restaurant Guide

We've carefully curated this selection of Park City's best restaurants to help you find the perfect dining experience. Unlike other guides that overwhelm you with endless options, we focus on quality over quantity, featuring only the establishments that consistently deliver exceptional experiences.

Our Selection Process

Every restaurant in our guide has been thoroughly researched, with verified hours, contact information, and pricing. We regularly update our listings to ensure accuracy.

Price Guide

  • $ - Under $15 per person
  • $$ - $15-30 per person
  • $$$ - $30-50 per person
  • $$$$ - $50+ per person

Reservation Tips

During peak season (December-March and July-August), we recommend making reservations at least 2-3 days in advance for popular restaurants, especially for weekend dinners.
